review:
The game has a lot of potential but in the end it's just a hot (or rather lukewarm) mess with the:
- lac of explantaion of mechanics. controls, objectives(or anything at all...)
- lack of gameplay logic
- terrible hitboxes, incoherent & contradicting mechanics

The game has a walk you through system, giving hints when / if needed - well guess what, it does not work.

Looked up a guide after 4 rooms and spedrun the achievments, skipping parts whenever I can.
Make sure to only buy this on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561199010042150', 'num_games_owned': 3874, 'num_reviews': 2454, 'playtime_forever': 205, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 205, 'last_played': 1705777010}
review:
I am 32 years old.

My ex-wife and I have a daughter together, and we adopted our son together. Both are now 4 years old.

When we were going through our separation, I felt lost and unhappy. I was self-destructive. One day, I was so angry with everything spiraling out of control that I punched a concrete wall in a moment of overwhelming emotion. This resulted in breaking my fifth metacarpal in my right hand—the hand I worked with, played games with, and used to carry my children to bed—the hand I desperately needed to ensure I could continue providing.

Upon learning the severity of the self-inflicted damage, I became almost suicidal. Keep in mind that just a few months before this, I was the happiest man, with no history of depression or anxiety. I had never experienced anger outbursts, nor was I the type to break down and cry, but I was in a tough situation that truly prevented me from seeing the light on the other side.

With nothing better to do, I looked for a game I could play WITH ONE HAND while recovering. Somehow, I stumbled upon this game and read some of the comments. I decided it was worth a try... I must admit I didn't beat the game, nor did I play as much as some of you. In fact, I may have played this game for only a day or two. That being said, after doing so, I had a new joy and hope for life. I managed to leave behind the pain and suffering that had been thrust upon me. I could experience the joy and happiness of other people. I relaxed for 5 ♥♥♥♥ minutes listening to this music, long enough to realize that I would be okay.

After realizing this, I turned off the game and went back to work. My hand hurt a lot, but I was motivated. I stopped feeling so sorry for myself and became the father I needed to be at that moment, not the weak boy I was behaving like.

Today, I am close friends with the mother of my children. We don't fight, argue, or say hurtful things to each other. We are parents and friends.

Now I have 3 children. My third child is, wait, ALSO 4 YEARS OLD. The woman I am with was going through a very similar situation at the time of my separation, and we just unexpectedly stumbled into each other's lives. We have been dating for a year and are very happy together.

Moral of the story: you never know what life has in store for you, and if I had given up when all odds were against me, I wouldn't be where I am today. This silly little game helped me realize that.

Thank you.

review: If you like thriller/horror stories in the style of the SAW movies, this game is a must. Its a very good short puzzle adventure with have 5 endings. I'll give 7/10, just because the game still have some bugs which make the mouse acting weird sometimes. You can't avoid those bugs, but you can save your game before you exit each room, and if the bug happens, just exit, close the game and restart it with your last saved game. That will solve the problem.

author: {'steamid': '76561198995387103', 'num_games_owned': 6516, 'num_reviews': 3379, 'playtime_forever': 334, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 334, 'last_played': 1703542967}
review:
商店页面标注有中文，先好评，1.5内可考虑入库。商店页面右上小图，看着像电锯惊魂的元素，这电影，喜欢恐怖的推荐观看。

202304，steam，steam掉卡抵扣，t a o宝，支付宝红包，humble，indie gala，daily indie game，fanatical，杉果，它处自定义包入的本体约4元。爱人如己，目前就这，看以后追评。有中文的游戏请耐心自研体验乐趣，攻略指南尽量不用。不建议使用外挂，插件，作弊之类的，游戏都要这样搞，那现实里那更是如此了。兄弟萌，强烈建议不要第三方平台的小店买y u额，通过饰品等挂steam市场转的，高概率red信乃至封号，且行且珍惜。

author: {'steamid': '76561198009653377', 'num_games_owned': 634, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 492, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 492, 'last_played': 1702469270}
review:
A játékot először meglátva, nagyon szimpatikusnak találtam. Megfogott az előzetese és az ára is, így gondoltam adok neki egy esélyt.
Végigjátszva már kicsit vegyesebb érzéseim vannak vele kapcsolatban. Fontos leszögeznem, hogy alapjáraton nagyon a gondolkodásra fókuszál. Rengeteg kód, kulcs és zár vár az adott játékosra, amiket szépen aprólékosan át kell vizsgálni minden egyes szobában. Több végigjátszás is létezik, így nem biztos, hogy egy tárgy vagy egy kód ugyan az lesz, az esetleges második nekifutásra.
Számomra néhol nem volt egyértelmű, hogy pontosan mi is lenne a megoldás, de egyébként létezik egy "Spoiler" lehetőség is, amit a nagyobb elakadás esetén lehet használni. (Személy szerint próbáltam elkerülni, viszont egy alkalommal muszáj volt már használnom.)
A történet szerintem nagyon jópofa. Öt különböző befejezése van és elég drámai is, ha az ember nem a rosszat kapja.
Szerintem egy próbát simán megérhet, viszont ajánlott egy türelmesebb, gondolkodóbb beállítottsággal rendelkezni hozzá.

author: {'steamid': '76561199066201061', 'num_games_owned': 65, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 464, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 464, 'last_played': 1700276401}
review: Esse é um bom jogo, com certeza um dos jogos que joguei. Ele não tem uma história assim tão elaborada, porque você consegue adivinhar o Plot antes de terminá-lo, más até que não é tão ruim. Dá pra levar uns sustinhos e tal... O melhor desse jogo é os puzzles em si, pois ele costuma te trollar bastante com as respostas, mas uma coisa que me deixa um pouco incomodado é que o game te dá as respostas de graça se você quiser, assim estragando a experiência de ficar preso durante muito tempo até resolvê-los. Enfim... eu recomendo, é um dos jogos que joguei e esse game fica preguiçoso próximo do final...

review:
Few translation issues and far-stretched answers ruined the game for me, everything else was cool though. 

I did fine with the game for the first bit, but eventually I ran through things that was so far fetched that it didn't make sense how anyone was supposed to figure it out. I don't think it is me that is thinking that either, I usually do good with puzzles and games like this.

One of the puzzles I remember had a translation issue though, where the clue was different than the answer, which is really not good for a game like this.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030784015', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11208, 'playtime_forever': 306, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 306, 'last_played': 1689948537}
review:
Play With Me: Escape Room is an older game from 2013.  It's 10 years old at the time of this review.  It's a point and click adventure game with a horror/escape room theme put together with node-webkit/nw.js, and the design and presentation is more like a browser/mobile game than a dedicated PC game. 

Gameplay consists of solving puzzles by clicking around on various screen hotspots while a macabre horror/thriller message is revealed through the plot of the game.  Fair enough, and if the technical implementation was better than this Flash-like delivery, this could have gone somewhere. 

From a technical perspective, the game doesn't meet basic minimum requirements that most PC gamers expect as standard.

While there are options to change the resolution for the game, all this does is scale up the simplistic 2D art assets used to make the game, which makes little or no difference to the graphics quality.  Without any other substantial graphics tweaks, it's not possible for gamers to improve the lacklustre 2D visuals.

The game features mostly static, barely animated 2D images, the kind of thing you expect to see in browser/flash games.  While the artwork itself, while mediocre, might be considered passable, the visual presentation here is negligible, it might as well be a slideshow or a Youtube video.  Pac-Man, Space Invaders and Asteroids had more advanced animation and visuals going on than this game does.

The developers didn't design the game for modern gaming PCs, as such the display resolution caps out at around 1440p, there's no support for the state-of-the-art 4K or higher resolutions.  The game simply won't look right on modern gaming displays due to this failure on the part of the developers.

For gameplay purposes, because the user interface for this game is mostly just 2D static images... it might as well be a browser game.  And we all know, Steam isn't here to compete with Chrome and Firefox.  If the game can be done in a web browser, it's just not rich or compelling enough to appeal to serious gamers on PC.

These technical defects push this game below acceptable standards for any modern PC game.

Play With Me: Escape Room didn't appeal much to the people who own a copy of the game, either.  It has achievements, and they show us a very clear picture that the game didn't really capture any interest from gamers.  The most commonly and easily attained achievement is for calling the police, trivial to get, it happens in the first room, but less than 13 percent of players bothered to get that far before uninstalling the game.  Hardly a success story, gamers just weren't all that interested in the game.

Reviewing SteamDB to check how popular this game was with players reveals a surprise... there's a very healthy spike in player counts for the game.  But this isn't consistent with the achievement stats, that show less than 13 percent of players bothered playing the game for any reasonable amount of time.  How is it possible for this game to have so many concurrent players who weren't even playing the game?  Trading cards.  Players will use card idling software to collect the cards and sell them, but this won't trigger any achievements in-game.  That tells us people only really bought this game for trading cards, and that's a damning indictment of the woeful quality.  A closer look at the numbers shows the game just has a couple of players every week running up the game and idling it for cards, then deleting it.  We must ask how it benefits gamers for there to be so many games like this, with no merit as a serious game, that only generate sales from people idling and selling the trading cards.

Play With Me: Escape Room is modestly priced at $3 USD, but it's not really worth it, with the technical defects and browser-like aspects of the game, especially considering there's hundreds of better free browser games and mobile apps.

author: {'steamid': '76561198396165148', 'num_games_owned': 184, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 211, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 211, 'last_played': 1651508558}
review:
Play with me ist ein sehr tolles und schönes Escape Room Spiel. Es hat sich Saw als vorbild genommen da die einzelnen Räume eine Anlehnung an Saw sind. Es macht sehr viel Spaß und ist manchmal auch etwas knifflig aber genau das  macht ein schönes und vernünftiges Escape Room Spiel für mich aus. 

Es ist für jeden geeignet, sei es neu einsteiger oder schon erfahrene Escape Room Spieler.

author: {'steamid': '76561198371234584', 'num_games_owned': 462, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 276, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 276, 'last_played': 1689437790}
review:
Buen diseño artístico y diversas animaciones interesantes pero como juego es impresentable. Tiene una interfaz medio tosca y, hasta lo que pude jugar, malas mecánicas. Estaría mejor, primero, si tuviera subtítulos, creo que es muy importante no solo para seguir la trama de la historia de manera correcta sino también para que el jugador tenga una idea de lo que tiene que hacer de vez en cuando (ya sé que hay un objetivo marcado pero eso es algo mas general que puntual). Segundo, indicadores para el puntero nuevos ya que por lo general se espera que eso sea lo que guía al jugador a hacer las acciones correspondientes, a mi no me sirve que me pongan un destello sobre una mesa para saber que puedo moverla porque cuando paso el puntero por encima no sé que puedo hacerlo.
Una cosa más, no sé si fui el único pero en la habitación nro. 3 no encontré el nombre de usuario en ningún lado, no me quedo claro el orden de los códigos muchas veces y terminé optando por el spoiler en más de una ocasión. Ya en la habitación 5 creo que morí, digo creo porque estaba buscando por los costados de la pantalla y no pude ver bien qué pasó, me dió bronca y lo desinstalé.
Sé que es solo una persona la encargada de desarrollar el juego y lo felicito porque no debe ser fácil encargarse de todo y que todo salga perfecto pero la verdad, por mi primera impresión y más allá del precio que pueda tener, no lo volvería a jugar.

author: {'steamid': '76561197968193546', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 200, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 200, 'last_played': 1687197100}
review:
***SPOIIIILLLLEEEEEER****

Hallo Ihr Rätselelfen!

Das war ja mal was! Da kam der Riddler und hat einen so richtig hart rangenommen dude!!
Schaurige Story, schaurige Rätsel und alle 2 Minuten das Türklopfgeräusch in Verbindung mit den Sonic Ausrastpuppen!! Die waren so schnell und das einzige, was sie abhielt, war eine handelsübliche Taschenlampe. UND der Twist, ich sags euch. Das glaubt man nicht und will man nicht wahr haben... Es ist seine ***SPOIIIILLLLEEEEEER**** Alte ja..., wenn ich doch auf die Story ein bischen gehört hätte, hätte es mich auch interessiert :D

Ja.. 2,49, paar bierchen und hin und her Rätsel kann auch die Zeit wie im Flug vergehen! Kleiner Tipp.. Wenn du wirklich nichts zu tun hast, dann lass es dir schenken und du hast eine ganz nette Zeit.. Obwohl nett der Bruder von ihr wisst schon ist

Grüße, macht was draus

review:
Riktigt nöjd med spelet. mycket spel för pengarna! Lagom klurig och lagom långt. Roligt med många mini games i spelet, och kul att det finns fler endings baserat på vad du gör för val. 
Det enda negativa jag har att säga om spelet är att vissa "pussel" kunde vara lite luddiga och att mitt spel kraschade 2 gånger under den tid jag spelade. 
8/10
Bra spel för one man crew! :)

review:
Me hubiera encantado poder recomendar este juego, se nota que el desarrollador le puso mucho amor a su juego, la ambientación esta muy bien, gráficamente se ve lindo y ni una critica a la banda sonora.

Pero los puzles son horrendos, necesitas usar todas las ayudas del juego, la guías de steam y buscar en el foro de steam para poder resolver algunas, lo vuelve muy tedioso, se pierde mucho tiempo y se corta el ambiente del juego al pausar tantas veces para ver guías, tópicos y etc.

review:
Sehr geehrte Damen und Herren,

Normale Point and klick sind normaler Weise sehr einfach zu kreieren, man platziert ein paar Schlüssel, Türen oder Notizen platzieren, kurze Story und ein paar Jumpscares. 
JEDOCH sticht diese Spiel sehr stark heraus da es stark an Hinweisen auslässt und somit dem Spieler sehr viel Freiraum gibt binnen kürzester Zeit (10 min) ein Rätsel zu lösen welches man nur mithilfe von Adleraugen anfangen kann zu lösen.
2,39€ sind für ein Spiel dieses Kalibers etwas zu hoch angesetzt. 

 Müsst ihr wissen

(P.S.: Jumpscares sind Top) [spoiler] BUUUUUUUHHH [/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198078772275', 'num_games_owned': 3435, 'num_reviews': 665, 'playtime_forever': 114, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 114, 'last_played': 1679156359}
review:
[h1] Средненький квест рум про похищение мужа и жены.[/h1]


[code] Время прохождения - 1.5 часа. [/code]


✅[i] [b] - АТМОСФЕРА.[/b][/i] 
Шикарно создана, звуки, визуал, история.

Приятно и жутко находится в этих комнатах.


✅[i] [b] - ВИЗУАЛ.[/b][/i] 
Потрясающая хоррор обстановка, прорисованы мелкие объекты, кровь на стенах, надписи.


✅[i] [b] - СЮЖЕТ.[/b][/i] 
Я бы сказал - лучший сюжет среди "квест румов", самый интригующий и самый взрослый.

Передаётся через записки и через звонки по телефону.


✅[i] [b] - КОНЦОВКА.[/b][/i] 
Окей, реально годно.



❌[i] [b] -ТЕХНИЧЕСКАЯ ЧАСТЬ.[/b][/i] 
Удлинило мне игру.

1 - Хит боксы супер кривые, и взять какой-то объект или применить это уже испытание.

2 - Если крутить колёсико мыши (зум), то изображение багуется и накладываются две картинки друг на друга.

3 - Ещё ряд багов, когда не срабатывает скрипт, и это спустя 5 лет релиза.
Я думал что это я туплю, полез на ютуб, а у меня вообще не было того предмета, который был нужен, в итоге запустил игру с начала, недалеко ушёл.

4 - Крайне долгие анимации.


❌[i] [b] -ГЕЙМПЛЕЙ.[/b][/i] 
Визуально каждая комната уникальна, да и сюжетно тоже.

Но в плане загадок - тебе нужно найти пароль ВЕЗДЕ.
Для этого нужно открыть 112 чемоданов.

Очень скучно.

На геймплей такое огромное количество жалоб, что разработчик по итогу добавил возможность пропускать поиски пароля.

author: {'steamid': '76561199159516975', 'num_games_owned': 212, 'num_reviews': 103, 'playtime_forever': 32, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 32, 'last_played': 1708291749}
review: Play With Me: Escape Room to gra typu escape room stworzona przez studio Airem. Gra oferuje interesujące wyzwania i zagadki, a także tajemniczą i klaustrofobiczną atmosferę.Grafika gry jest dobra, z dobrze wykonanymi detale i efektami wizualnymi. Muzyka i dźwięki są dobrze dopasowane do klimatu gry i dodają do niego dodatkowej tajemniczości.Fabuła gry polega na próbie ucieczki z zamkniętego pomieszczenia poprzez rozwiązywanie zagadek i znajdowanie ukrytych przedmiotów. Gracze muszą zebrać różne przedmioty i używać ich, aby odkryć tajemnicę pokoju i znaleźć wyjście.System rozgrywki w grze jest prosty i łatwy do zrozumienia, co czyni ją idealną dla osób, które lubią gry typu escape room. Gra oferuje różne poziomy trudności, dzięki czemu każdy gracz może znaleźć odpowiednie wyzwanie.Podsumowując, Play With Me: Escape Room to ciekawa gra typu escape room, która oferuje dobrze zrealizowane zagadki i wyzwania oraz tajemniczą i klaustrofobiczną atmosferę. Gra ta może zainteresować fanów gier typu escape room oraz osoby, które lubią rozwiązywać logiczne zagadki.

author: {'steamid': '76561198145862956', 'num_games_owned': 2416, 'num_reviews': 272, 'playtime_forever': 343, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 343, 'last_played': 1549894957}
review:
[code]《Play With Me: Escape Room》这款游戏我之前玩的好像是没更新过的版本，游戏主要以点击解密式的玩法来让玩家慢慢探索。
但是游玩的时候比较容易卡关，谜题和答案的联系不是很紧密，再加上当时的中文还是机翻，有一种难以言喻的谷歌美感，让人抓狂。所以打了半天也不知道自己干了啥。
不过如今新版本早已上线，也许这些问题已经解决。如果你是那种“电锯惊魂”里对一边在压抑环境里解谜一边揭开真相感到肾上腺素急升的玩家的话，那么本作可能适合你。[/code]
[code] [h1] 关注 [url=store.steampowered.com/curator/43267569/] 游民星空鉴赏家，超多游戏任你选 [/url] [/h1] [/code]

author: {'steamid': '76561198126840878', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 101, 'playtime_forever': 168, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 168, 'last_played': 1675210243}
review:
Play With Me: Escape Room is a point and click puzzle game about getting into a car crash with your wife after going out to celebrate your birthday and waking up in a room chained up, and you have to go through numerous different puzzle rooms in order to escape this death trap. See, you were kidnapped by the "Illusion Killer', and you play as Robert Hawk, a reporter, who has been reporting on the killer and his traps for a long time. That's the basic gist of the story, you basically solve difficult puzzles, read clues about previous victims (who were kidnapped because they weren't persecuted for their crimes as the justice system blows donkey d i c k. You also have a poison serum thing in your veins, and you have to go through in a time limit. This is where I'm gonna go into gameplay because WOW do I have issues with this game.

The gameplay is basically a puzzle room game, you go through about twenty different rooms trying to figure out solutions to get the puzzle for the keypad to get into the next puzzle room. Certain rooms are easy enough, with puzzles telegraphed in a way that makes sense; but that's CERTAIN ROOMS. Most of them I have no fu c k ing clue what the hell I'm doing, and even the clues they give are confusing as hell. If this is what it's like being in a trap from the Jigsaw Killer, I'm f u c ked if I ever get caught because I can't solve puzzles to save my life. Now you're thinking, why give the game a bad review if you suck at puzzles? Well I do suck at puzzles, but at the very least, I'd like to feel like I have a sporting chance and that I feel dumb as hell when the solution is actually found. But I don't, because some of these things are so convoluted, I don't even understand how to get it in the first place. So, there's a prison cell room near the end of the game, in this room you have to knock out some blocks with a hammer right? Cool, behind it is a bunch of random numbers. This game is full of trial and error so what you'll end up doing is that you'll be trying numbers in all sorts of different numbers in a bunch of different combinations. Here's another issue, sometimes the graphical render is so blurry you can't understand what the hell they're saying. What I ended up doing was in certain rooms, I just decided to give up and reveal the code via spoiler so I could get out of there. Some codes they give we're kinda iffy like they'd have for example: 875Cat* right? But the * won't register, so it's basically an 8 you have to type. And segwaying into another thing, you'll find computers that give secret info I guess according to a guide (which I used often because what the hell?), you're supposed to break out text command prompts but I could never really understand what I'm doing because I don't do text command prompts? See a part of me feels stupid for writing this all up, but the way a friend of mine put it, the puzzles should at least should be solvable and not overly convoluted with random s h i t you can't understand unless you're using a guide. Again, I suppose the puzzles in this game would make the Jigsaw Killer proud, but by the end I was just using a guide full force because I had no clue what I was doing. Also you're doing this in a time limit, so you'll need to race against the clock, pick up syringes to get your health back, and try not to die in certain rooms (whether it's wiggling your flashlight, or clicking on certain things before you can get certain items). One mixed thing I will say is that it does some meta stuff well, like for example: one room you have to lower the music volume in the settings all the way to open a door. BUT HOW WAS I SUPPOSED TO KNOW? One thing towards the end had me blow a candle out by literally blowing into the mic, the last example involves, get this, getting the secret ending by going to a hidden website hidden inside of one of the game's promotional trailers which leads to an story bit I'll discuss next. Other things I'll mention are you have to replace batteries for your phone and flashlight sometimes, puzzle solutions ARE randomized, you have to use your in game phone to take calls or texts to actually solve puzzles, and you can play goofy little games or change your ringtone (Ringtone 3 was the goofiest and gave me and my friend watching a chuckle). You can also collect teddy bears, "Signs of Illusion", and confession notes as well as newspapers and other code pages. So I may suck at puzzles, but I felt this game did it in a way that was a bit too much. Gonna go into the plot here:

The story is again about Robert Hawk, a reporter, and your wife Sara, a lawyer, going out on Robert's birthday to do stuff. You get into a crash and you wake up in chains and have to escape. You also learn about the Illusion Killer and how they target criminals who got away with their crimes which is cool, I like the SAW movies so I'm cool with this. In two separate instances you have to solve puzzles under a timer in order to save both Sara and Patrick offscreen for the best endings. Like the puzzles, there's a variation for each one living and dying as well as if you unlock the secret room in Room 10. If you unlock the secret room it's figured that you and Patrick are up to something fishy (which we kinda already guessed). Go through the rest, and you get locked in a coffin. Gonna throw some spoilers here: [Spoiler]: If you save both Patrick and Sara, it turns out Sara is the Illusion Killer. That's right, one of THREE characters is the Illusion Killer, and what a shock we predicted it in the third room. There was also another prediction that Patrick and Robert are the killers, and if you got the secret ending, they were both trying to frame Sara for the murders so they can "continue their work" and will continue it again. What do I think of this story? About average really, and the twists are predictable because they only really introduced three characters anyways, so who else we're we supposed to think it is? So let me get this straight. If Sara was the killer, and they were trying to frame her, did they trap themselves there? Did she just decide to play killer to go along with this? Why did she dress up and do all this stuff if you were framing her? I feel like it would be more realistic for the police to just shoot her (like they do anyways in real life) and her yelling bout her innocence then give some sort of speech explaining why she was the killer when she wasn't? I don't know, maybe I'm looking too far into this but it feels like a plot hole.[/Spoiler] Basically, it's an average story which atmospherically it gels great with SAW, but without an interesting twist or at least a bonkers one. Basically, think the last Saw movie in terms of predictability and you got it.

Graphical Presentation/Atmosphere is decent, the atmosphere is really creepy and unnerving, you'll have bugs crawling across your screen and above your clicker making you think it's actually your PC when it's not which is cool. It's a dark, oppressive, and hopeless feeling which I like. Graphics are the usual hidden object artwork style which I like and think it's charming. The music is unnerving, and it works for the game as it didn't help us with our panic levels much. The one downside I could give is that you can tell that the production of the game is in a different country, with Sara and Patrick sounding completely different then Robert, who sounds like an American and is emotive; of course I understand that budget constraints and such can lead to  dips in acting quality and I know whatever country these guys are from it might sound odd emoting in English, not me dissing on them it's actually of humorous; but it's noticeable.

Overall, I would only recommend this game for people with A LOT of patience, and the ability to think WAY outside the box. Otherwise skip it. The store page said: Slowly go mad thanks to a realistic system determining the mental state of your character. It worked.

author: {'steamid': '76561198121767373', 'num_games_owned': 5924, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 165, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 165, 'last_played': 1673483658}
review: Klare Empfehlung. Lustigerweise ist das Spiel gerade für 40 Cent im Sale. Könnt ihr nichts mit falsch machen. Ich hab es schon länger und auch unabhängig von dem aktuellen Sale jetzt gespielt. Hat sich gelohnt. Zum Teil recht schwierige Rätsel, weil man nicht immer genau versteht, was das Spiel von einem will, aber mit ein bisl Ehrgeiz und Durchhaltevermögen, sind die Rätsel leicht lösbar. Ein paar Sachen sind auf Zeit und die Gegner jagen mit der Taschenlampe empfand ich als schwierig, aber insgesamt hat es echt Spaß gemacht. Ich glaube sogar es gibt verschiedene Enden, aufgrund dessen was man schafft oder eben nicht schafft. Wer auf Wimmelbildspiele steht und das ganze in einem milden Horrorsetting theoretisch gut findet, der sollte Play With Me ne Chance geben.

author: {'steamid': '76561198344257675', 'num_games_owned': 163, 'num_reviews': 93, 'playtime_forever': 44, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 44, 'last_played': 1672441938}
review:
Наивкуснейший торт "Эстерхази"!

Знаменитый венгерский торт "Эстерхази" ничем не уступает "Наполеону", "Праге", "Захеру", "Киевскому" и т.д. Продукты (на 8 порций):

Коржи:

Белки - 9 шт.
Сахар - 200 г
Грецкие орехи - 200 г
Мука - 3 ст.л.
Соль - щепотка
Корица - щепотка

Крем:

Молоко - 100 мл
Кокосовое молоко - 100 мл
Сахар - 100 г
Желтки - 4 шт.
Масло сливочное - 250 г
Ликер - 2 ст.л.
Ванильный экстракт - 1 ч.л.
Абрикосовый джем - 2 ст. л.
Сгущенное молоко вареное - 200 г

Глазурь:

Белый шоколад - 200 г
Черный шоколад - 50 г
Сливки - 2 ст.л.
Для украшения:
Миндальные лепестки
	
1. Размешиваем в блендере орехи. В миске смешиваем орехи с мукой и добавляем корицу.

2. В отдельную чашку разбиваем белки, добавляем соль и взбиваем, постепенно добавляя маленькими порциями сахар. Взбиваем до плотных пиков.

3. Смешиваем ореховую смесь с белками, перемешиваем все аккуратно.

4. Разогреваем духовку до 150 градусов. Берем разъемную форму, снимаем борта - нам понадобится только нижняя часть формы. Форму смазываем обильно сливочным холодным маслом, посыпаем мукой. Выкладываем нашу смесь на форму. Разравниваем смесь по форме ножом и выпекаем 15-18 мин. У нас должно выйти 4 коржа.

5. Займемся кремом. Молоко смешиваем с кокосовым молоком, взбиваем. 1/3 от молока отливаем в маленькую кастрюльку. В оставшееся молоко добавляем сахар, желтки, ванильный экстракт, все взбиваем. 1/3 молока в кастрюльке ставим на огонь и помешиваем до закипания. Добавляем желтковую смесь и помешиваем до закипания. Выключаем, остужаем и помещаем на час в холодильник.

6. Берем масло комнатной температуры для крема и взбиваем с вареной сгущенкой. Добавляем наш заварной крем, ликер и все взбиваем. Крем готов.

7. Собираем торт. 3 коржа промазываем приготовленным кремом, последний корж промазываем повидлом. Белый шоколад и сливки растапливаем в кастрюльке, заливаем наш торт. Даем застыть шоколаду.

8. Черный шоколад растапливаем и рисуем при помощи шприца спираль. Берем зубочистку, рисуем перышки - от центра проводим линии, делим торт на 8 частей, потом в противоположную сторону проводим линии, деля эти 8 частей еще пополам и т.д.

Торт должен постоять ночь в холодильнике.

Приятного аппетита!

author: {'steamid': '76561198065637682', 'num_games_owned': 1146, 'num_reviews': 96, 'playtime_forever': 791, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 446, 'last_played': 1671104779}
review:
[h1]Análisis de Play with me[/h1] 

➥Juego de aventuras y suspense modo «point & click» y con cierto regusto a la archiconocida saga "SAW" pero con demasiadas diferencias. Ni escenas gore, ni sustos de importancia y 1/4 de la sangre que llegaba a correr en las películas. Eso sí algunos puzles son igual de enrevesados. Y el juego se centra en eso, pasar de habitación en habitación, resolviendo acertijos y buscando pistas como en un "Escape Room".

➥Cuenta con una buena e intrigante historia, con varios finales alternativos. El aspecto gráfico es aceptable al igual que la música y sonidos muy perturbadores. Una jugabilidad básica como todos los juegos de este tipo y con una duración que dependerá del rato que estés reventándote los sesos con los acertijos. Que por cierto algunos son muy originales y para resolverlos tendrás que buscar objetos fuera de la pantalla (Literal).

➥En definitiva, un juego que si tienes paciencia y buscas de una manera diferente te resultará incluso adictivo por un rato. Y si te resulta difícil encontrar pistas cuentas con un sistema de ayudas que te va facilitar mucho las cosas. Está en inglés pero con menú y subtitulos en español, cromos, logros y si lo compras en rebajas mejor que mejor. 4/10
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LQtn41c-yCQ&t=613s
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=agXHUnujlr0

author: {'steamid': '76561198040387734', 'num_games_owned': 350, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 232, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 232, 'last_played': 1669578650}
review:
Es un escape room bastente lmitado. 
La verdad que pongo que lo recomiendo simplemente pq no trata de ser mas de lo q es. Algunos puzzle son un poquito rebuscados. Y el sistema de pistas a veces no es muy receptivo, y otras veces t elo hace demasiado facil.
La historia es entretenida para lo corto que es. No tiene mucha profundidad, pero te da intriga.

Realmente recomiendo que lo compres y juegues si o si? La verdad que no. Pero si ya lo compraste, es corto, y dentro de todo entretenido.
Pero no me paso como con otros, que me hubiese gustado volver a arrancarlo por primera vez. Este apenas lo termine, lo desinstale y para mañana ya me habre olvidado que existio.

author: {'steamid': '76561199110762965', 'num_games_owned': 347, 'num_reviews': 195, 'playtime_forever': 204, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 204, 'last_played': 1668984842}
review:
Я конечно люблю квест игры

Короткая, но загадки порой ломают башку и это растягивает игру

Лишние карточки и ачивки не помешают))))

Нет атмосфера ужаса есть и моральный выбор глав героя, игру это не делает хорошей

Кстати за мини игры с телефоном респектус, в них провел времени больше, чем в самой игре

Общая оценка 5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198035442441', 'num_games_owned': 327, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 181, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 181, 'last_played': 1565153381}
review:
9 out of 10 Misfits will enjoy this game.

This game is great.  It adds point and click, puzzles, and a creepy theme to a great genre all while feeling like you are in the "Jigsaw" movies, which is great!

You are basically trapped in an area with little to no chance of escape and are tasked with doing just that, escaping!

The atmosphere is creepy and the sound is awesome.  The puzzles are good as well and make you use things around you in real life to actually solve some of them.  If you are into creepy games, puzzles, and fear of being killed from a game than this is definitely for you.

My only problem with the game is the length of it.  I was really excited to play it and loved every minute of it... but when I beat it in 3 hours of play time I was very sad.  That being said, you definitely will get your moneys worth out of the game as it is really cheap but a great addition to any gamers library!

author: {'steamid': '76561198071157751', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 201, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 201, 'last_played': 1667230207}
review:
This started out as a nice Puzzle Adventure with horror atmosphere. Well drawn and nicely done.
BUT it's not fun to solve riddles if you are put under such time pressure!

Rooms, where you die within seconds if you don't have the answer already, codes you have to brute force because you're getting less and less hints and then you don't even get to see your surroundings anymore.
It gets repetative, because the numbers of the codes are either in boxes or they appear after a trigger point. Each room you get into, you have the goal of getting aot of by entering a code for a door. So each room you do stuff to get a code, again and again. You get some hints about the story and this could be an interesting one. But I guess to make it exiting they put in the elements of time stress and loss of sight.
I personally prefer logic or at least the possibility of trying different things to learn a logic, not just brute forcing numbers and hecticly clicking on stuff you don't see.
Sadly, this game became frustrating for me as I progressed becuase if you fail and die, you have to try over and over agein. The start as a nice puzzle game gave me the expactation of this beeing a puzzle game. I don't like the hectic of most horror games. They are fun to watch, but I don't like playing it. I got enough stress in real life already, I play to relax, to have my own pace for a change. I like atmosphere and time to think. Sorry, I really don't like to downvote games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198032615196', 'num_games_owned': 245, 'num_reviews': 68, 'playtime_forever': 298, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 298, 'last_played': 1665926297}
review:
I LOVE escape room games - this is a point and click kinda game, where you have to find codes to open up locked chests and doors, there are a lot of rooms to go through. The code combinations aren’t always as straightforward as it might seem. so sometimes you have to experiment a bit with the order you use the different number/letter sequences. And sometimes it's difficult to see which numbers or letters are being written, due to the somewhat poor graphics. 
The story for me was okay, not that exciting and pretty predictable - it reminded me of the SAW franchise;“I want to play a game”, came to mind :P
I thought some of the “puzzles” were funny, I especially enjoyed the ones on how to navigate through the computers. And I also like that you can get several different endings, depending on the choices you make. 
Honestly, this was an okay game for me, nothing less nothing more.

author: {'steamid': '76561198049178947', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 217, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 217, 'last_played': 1665432627}
review:
Gra znaleziona podczas nudnego jesiennego wieczoru, na promocji. Jako, że rodzimy team, to wypiszę troszkę spostrzeżeń ;)

Minusy:
-nie jest intuicyjne (nie tłumaczy się gameplayu, przez przypadek dowiedziałam się, że obiekty można łączyć), mechaniki są fajne, szkoda że nie są troszkę wyjaśnione
-zagadki pod koniec stają się mocno monotonne (cały czas polegają na znajdowaniu haseł)
-wyciąganie i chowanie przedmiotów trwa niepotrzebnie długo, można by się obejść bez animacji
-zgadzam się z tym, że jest trochę za dużo dźwięków (szczególnie pukania)
-drobne błędy w produkcji: scenariusz aktorów różni się czasem od napisów, voice acting trochę spoileruje bo jest charakterystyczny, jak się wybiera dzwonek, to później nie przestaje grać i jest śmiesznie xD
-niektóre zagadki są trochę nielogiczne (wpadłam na nie przez przypadek) 

Plusy:
+mega super, że można wyłączyć migające światła i jumpscare'y
+nie trzeba plecaka usuwać xD wystarczy animację, bo sam plecak/zbieranie rzeczy jest fajne
+przepięknie zrobione lokacje
+dużo fajnych zagadek
+fajne mini gierki 
+super, że można zmienić poziom trudności
+jak na tak mały zespół to jestem mega pod wrażeniem
+jakość dźwięku super
+cena mega fajna (kupiłam za 1,88 zł, nie żałuję ani grosza)

Dzięki za gierkę, fajnie spędzone 3 wieczory, powodzenia z następnymi produkcjami! <3

author: {'steamid': '76561198288313241', 'num_games_owned': 206, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 164, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 164, 'last_played': 1664733252}
review:
Своих денег (13 рублей) однозначно стоит. Однако рекомендовать я её никому не буду.
Комнаты буквально на пару действий, да и те часто повторяются.
Множество предметов на нормальной сложности просто не нужны, на других перепроходить не видел смысла.
Те же самые загадки, но чутка сложнее.
Хорошо сделан рандом и нахождение ключевых предметов.
А теперь к сюжету, он тут вроде есть, но на самом деле его нет. Главный герой на протяжении всей игры трижды (минимум) говорит, что надо вызвать копов. Это его любимая фраза. 

В общем неплохо, но есть что подтянуть (например, руки в финальной сцене, текстурку просто забыли дорисовать), загадки однообразные, сюжет, которого нет. Финальный твист, скорее заставляет улыбаться, а песня грустить, потому что она слишком долгая на фоне одной картинки, которая не анимирована, даже камера не отдаляется.

review:
Aventura point & Click de terror, con musica del genial kevin macleod
Graficos muy buenos, ambientacion tambien, musica excelente (del gran kevin), sonidos buenos, Trama algo floja pero te engancha un poco, Durabilidad corta, jugabilidad moderada, algunos puzzles medio sencillos pero dificiles de ejecutar (poner numeros en un tablero), final no se entiende.

Esta bueno pero no termina de quedar muy en claro algunas cosas, la inspiracion sAW no la veo mucho porque no hay decisiones que te hagan plantearte nada de tu vida ni la de otro.

6/10  Vale la pena para tener algo de miedo pero no mucho mas

author: {'steamid': '76561198032830318', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 269, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 269, 'last_played': 1660973836}
review:
Play whit me, è un titolo curioso. 
Ammetto, attratto dal basso prezzo, l'ho acquistato e provato con gusto. Finito dopo solo 4 ore, devo dire che non è un titolo estremamente deludente, anche se ti lascia un pò di amaro in bocca per la conclusione assolutamente senza senso. 
In questo gioco vestirete i panni di un giornalista investigativo che ha rotto un pò troppo le scatole ad u serial killer il quale uccide con metodi alla Saw (già qui, inutilmente complicato). Verrete OVVIAMENTE invitati senza diritto di recesso, a giocare con lui. Da qui parte una serie di puzzle da risolvere per uscire dal labirinto dove lo psicopatico vi ha ficcato; la parte divertente di questi enigmi, è che non si possono risolvere con la sola osservazione dell'ambiente di gioco. Alcuni prevedono l'uso di carta e penna, di soluzioni alternative e l'utilizzo di specchi. Intendo specchi veri, quelli che avete nel bagno, per intendersi. Come dice lo stesso gioco, alcuni indovinelli può risolverli fuori dal gioco. Però si ferma qui; i jumpscare sono fatti male e non fanno paura manco a Paperino, esageratamente telefonati per potersi spaventare; il gameplay è strano ed insufficiente a mantenere attivo l'interesse;  basato sul muose e le cuffie con microfono (usato solo una volta ma carino!) e su giochi ottici che vi obbligheranno ad alzare il vostro culo da gamer dalla sedia, alla lunga annoia. Nel livello di difficoltà normale, inoltre, avrete attive due funzioni durante il gioco, la mano amica (nome infelice) che vi indica gli indizi per risolvere l'enigma e lo spoiler, che vi risolve l'enigma; considerato che spesso dovrete trovate solo codici, lo spoiler già da se fa tutto il lavoro. 
Nel complesso si merita la sufficienza ma sinceramente, non pagatelo più di 40 cents, la cifra a cui l'ho acquistato io.

author: {'steamid': '76561198904459604', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 91, 'playtime_forever': 787, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 787, 'last_played': 1653511470}
review:
Probé la demo y me gustó, así que acabé comprándomelo, encima ahora está en oferta a 0,40 €, ¿quién no se lo compra por ese precio?

Es básicamente un escape room tipo point and click. Vas de habitación en habitación resolviendo acertijos para poder pasar a la siguiente, y a la vez hay una historia de fondo en la que los protagonistas son Robert Hawk y su esposa Sara. Después de la intro, una vez empieza el juego, te pones en la piel de Robert y vas buscando a Sara.  El juego en sí no da miedo, aunque algún momento de tensión hay.

Por lo general los acertijos y puzzles tienen una dificultad entre media y fácil, aunque hay 2 o 3 que hay que buscar el resultado por internet porque no se sabe ni de donde sale. También decir que puedes activar que haya pistas por si te quedas pillado.

Da cromos, tiene logros fáciles de conseguir, es entretenido, y además es rejugable, por mi parte queda recomendado 100%.

author: {'steamid': '76561198211094043', 'num_games_owned': 1037, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 520, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 520, 'last_played': 1653683889}
review:
Un juego que tiene 3 puntos, absurdo de lo poco intuitivo que llega a ser, en el medio muy difícil pero no imposible, realmente te hace penar en TODAS las posibilidades y habitaciones muy fáciles que toman 1 min en hacerse, a pesar de eso creo que esta bien balanceado ya que las habitaciones fáciles te hacen no mandar a la mierda al developer y que sigas jugando.
Muy buen juego, ambientación, atmósfera, historia interesante (varios finales), ademas siempre estas tenso lo que compensa los jumpscares "pobres" que tiene, pero a su vez se entienden los sustos por el tipo de juego que es. Vale la pena hasta en precio normal.

author: {'steamid': '76561199154529474', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 379, 'playtime_forever': 52, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 52, 'last_played': 1653609207}
review: The demo wasn't bad. The game went on sale for 50 cents the day after I played it. I am glad that's all I paid for it. The voice acting is terrible and annoying-so much that I can't maintain interest in the story. Robert talks entirely too much. Sara sounds like she is reading from a script, not at all convincing in her supposed terror. It's like a "find the key" simulator, except that it's codes. Some may like it. I just couldn't stay engaged.

author: {'steamid': '76561198106570362', 'num_games_owned': 813, 'num_reviews': 75, 'playtime_forever': 357, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 357, 'last_played': 1650823705}
review:
A horror escape room puzzle point and click. 

You, along with your wife, have been kidnapped and you have to escape the killer's "Funhouse". Each room poses a number of puzzles for you to complete in order to progress. 

I thought it was pretty well made considering it's a low budget indie. You can tell there was inspiration from the horror franchise SAW put into it.  The atmosphere and audio is well done. Puzzles are interesting but after the first few rooms they got a bit repetitive. Voice acting is pretty cringe. UI felt clunky and the animation when taking out your phone or matches is way too slow. It's like the protagonist is standing at the bottom of the ocean. If you're into achievements, it's easy to 100%.

All in all not great, but at least it's different. If you're a horror/puzzle fan I would recommend it but only at a heavy discount.

author: {'steamid': '76561198149766821', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 177, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 177, 'last_played': 1648599316}
review:
Pubblico questa recensione dopo aver completato il gioco , in 3 ore esatte.
La storia non è malaccio , nonostante il doppiaggio lasci a desiderare.
Per quanto riguarda il gameplay i primi schemi sono interessanti ma si perde molto e ripete molto negli ultimi come se non avessero più voglia di sviluppare il gioco.
La grafica ricorda molto quegli escape room che si trovavano un po di tempo fa online , simile ad un punta e clicca , con la differenza che questo gioco rispetto ad un escape room normale online dura molto di più.
Un'ultima considerazione , il costo è adeguato ma alcune meccaniche lasciano veramente a desiderare.
La pecca più grande del gioco , per me , è il sistema di ambient , ovvero , in alcune parti del gioco si sente qualcuno che bussa a qualche porta anche se accanto a te porte non ce ne sono e come questi suoni ce ne sono molti altri inadeguati alla situazione e all'ambiente che ti circonda.
Viene presentato anche come un "similare" di Saw l'enigmista ma , a mio parere , non c'ha niente a cui vedere se non per il personaggio sadico che tortura la gente per i crimini commessi.
Se vi aspettate un consiglio sincero , c'è molto meglio sicuramente.

author: {'steamid': '76561199101272058', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 136, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 91, 'last_played': 1646255226}
review:
Ani to ciekawe ani straszne, klimatu brak, ciągłe dźwięki mające go budować występują w takiej ilości, że osiągają odwrotny efekt. Zagadki są mało ciekawe i w dużej części frustrujące. Jako osoba, która uwielbia grać w gry logiczne i horrory/thrillery, nie polecam.

Edit: zmusiłwm się do dalszej gry mając nadzieję, że później będzie lepiej, ale nie dało się nawet tego skończyć. Zagadki stawały się coraz bardziej powtarzalne, w każdym pokoju praktycznie to samo. Jeśli nie masz co zrobić z pieniędzmi, idź kup sobie czekoladę, lepiej na tym wyjdziesz. Chyba, że masz problemy ze snem, wtedy możesz w to zainwestować. W tej roli gra działa bardzo skutecznie.

author: {'steamid': '76561198051257051', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 188, 'playtime_forever': 551, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 551, 'last_played': 1644093946}
review:
Terror Meter 4/10
Narrative Intrigue 3/10
Visuals 9/10
Difficulty 4/10
Length <2hrs

Play with Me is a Point and Click escape game, which sees the player having to play through multiple escape rooms to escape from a serial killer. The game feels like a giant saw trap the player has to get through before time runs out for them. The stand out part of the game is the art, which really makes all rooms in the game feel unique, and have so many homages to horror movies. 

The puzzles in the game feel like they start out unique, but as you get further into the game, they become about finding the code to get through the next door. While not a problem in the game, it would have been better to see a range of item collection, to breaking doors or even having to escape through a vent. Just ways to make the game feel less monotonous.

One of the problems with the puzzles was some break the 4th wall, you will need to modify sound or go outside the game and watch the trailer to complete two of the puzzles.

The story absolutely confuses me, when you play through all the endings, I cannot make any sense of which one is real. I cannot even really tell you who the serial killer actually is, or why the player's character is taken. All the parts of info I was piecing together early in the game is ever forgotten about or dismissed by the ending, and sort of imposes more questions on the game that the game does have time for.

The game is a bit buggy, I had difficulty zooming and rotating items I picked up. It became a bit of a bother and I had to restart the game a few times.

This game is such a middling ground when it comes to a recommendation, for one core reason it gets a recommendation is the art. There is not a point in the entire game in which the visuals are not strong, and create unique environments for the player to go through. A lot of the horror moments look just amazing, and I just wish we could have had more of it.

Here is a link to my playthrough, be warned I get stuck a lot and there is no guide for most puzzles as they randomise in each run:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Fy5ViaHhK9o&t=2s

author: {'steamid': '76561198334401467', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 233, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 233, 'last_played': 1642819897}
review:
Riddles are very repetitive, Story is kinda boring. 
In the middle of the game the in-game zooming option started to mess with the screen format which was annoying 8dont know if that happened with everyone). If you want to play an escape game simulator in the style of a Saw movie and don´t want to pay too much this game is for you.
At the beginning it actually was entertaining and there are some fun easter eggs I really appreciated but the repetitive style of the riddles makes it more annoying to play when you move along in the story.

author: {'steamid': '76561198042620952', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1382, 'playtime_forever': 245, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 245, 'last_played': 1642799963}
review:
[h1] Genre [/h1] Ein First Person Point & Click Escape Room Spiel mit Psycho Horror Elementen

[h1] Story [/h1] Wir spielen einen Mann namens Robert und hatte wohl anscheinend einen Autounfall. Als wir zu uns kommen sind wir gefesselt in einem Verschlossenen Raum. Wir müssen nun versuchen auszubrechen und herausfinden wer genau dahinter steckt

[h1] Gameplay [/h1] Das Spiel erinnert sofort an die Filmreihe "SAW". Es gibt insgesamt 19 Räume. In jedem Raum müssen wir eine verschlossene Tür mit einem Code öffnen. Um den jeweiligen Code zu bekommen, muss man im Raum kleine Rätsel lösen um an Teile des jeweiligen Codes zu kommen. Die Rätsel sind recht leicht zu lösen, wenn man mal nicht weiter weiß gibt es auch eine Spoiler Funktion, die einem den Code direkt verrät. Zudem sammeln wir auch einige Hilfreiche Gegenstände ein, die uns helfen wie z.B. eine Taschenlampe, Streichhölzer, Spritzen mit Gegenmittel (ja wir sind vergiftet und müssen stets auf unsere Lebensanzeige achten aber so schlimm ist es nicht weil die Anzeige so gut wie nie fällt). In einigen Räumen kann man, wenn man zu lange braucht auch sterben. Die Soundeffekte sind ordentlich und auch die Atmosphäre ist gut gelungen. Der Voice Actor von Robert kommt mir auch sehr bekannt vor aber ich konnte die Stimme irgendwie nicht zuordnen, habe sie aber definitiv schon öfters mal gehört

[h1] Achievements [/h1] Es gibt insgesamt 10 Erfolge. Hierfür muss man das Spiel beenden, einen Geheimen Raum finden um das Geheime Ende zu sehen und alle Teddy Bären im Spiel finden

[h1] Pro/Contra [/h1]
+ Story ist ganz OK
+ Gute Soundeffekte
+ Gute Atmosphäre
+ Der Voice Actor vom Hauptcharakter hat mir gut gefallen (kenne ich auch irgendwo her)
+ Rätsel sind ganz gut (nicht zu schwer)
+ Mehrere Endings
+ Achievements
+ Sammelkarten

[h1] Fazit [/h1] Ein wirklich gutes First Person Escape Room Horror Spiel. gerade für den kleinen Preis kann man hier absolut nicht meckern. Wer gerne Escape Room Spiele mag, sollte sich dieses Spiel ruhig zulegen, da kann man nichts Falsch machen bei dem Preis

author: {'steamid': '76561198796851430', 'num_games_owned': 927, 'num_reviews': 3722, 'playtime_forever': 7165, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7165, 'last_played': 1635449251}
review:
《陪我玩玩（Play With Me）》是一款第一人称恐怖解谜游戏，以其引人入胜的故事情节、紧张刺激的气氛构建以及巧妙绝伦的谜题设计赢得了玩家们的高度赞誉。

首先游戏的故事背景深厚且充满悬念，玩家扮演的角色记者Robert Hawk为了寻找失踪的妻子，意外陷入了一场由著名恐怖电影《电锯惊魂》中的经典反派“竖锯”精心策划的生死游戏。这种与恶名昭彰的“幻影人”斗智斗勇的情节设置，不仅让玩家能够深切感受到角色的绝望与挣扎，还成功地营造出一种身临其境的恐怖体验。

在游戏玩法上展现出了极高的设计水准。各种复杂的谜题层层递进，紧密关联着主线剧情的发展，每解开一个谜团都像是拨开一层迷雾，使得玩家在恐惧与压力中不断探寻真相。与此同时，游戏内的环境互动丰富多样，每一个细节都可能隐藏着关键线索，考验着玩家的观察力与逻辑推理能力。

视听效果方面堪称一流。阴森诡异的音效设计极大地增强了游戏的恐怖感，配合上精细刻画的场景美术，无论是破败不堪的废弃建筑还是弥漫着死亡气息的陷阱房间，无不令人毛骨悚然却又欲罢不能。而原声音乐更是锦上添花，适时烘托出紧张气氛，将玩家的情绪推向高潮。

另外游戏的剧情分支和多结局设计，也为玩家提供了反复游玩的动力，每一次选择都将影响最终的故事走向，增加了游戏的可玩性和重玩价值。

总而言之，凭借其出色的叙事手法、精巧的谜题设计以及高度沉浸式的游戏体验，成功地在恐怖解谜类游戏中脱颖而出。对于喜欢挑战心理极限、热爱解谜探索及热衷于深度剧情体验的玩家来说，这款游戏无疑是值得推荐的佳作。在黑暗中找寻光明，于恐惧中把握生存的希望，《陪我玩玩》正是这样一场令人难忘的心跳瞬间之旅。

author: {'steamid': '76561198224336060', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 705, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 705, 'last_played': 1605184532}
review: Considerando che è fatto da una persona sola è un bel gioco. Devi risolvere dei puzzle per uscire dalla stanza, proprio come un'escape room. Il tutto architettato da un pazzo che la polizia cerca senza risultati, adesso ha scelto te poichè sei un giornalista che lavora alla sua storia. Il gioco essenzialmente è un point and click, molto noir e interattivo, inoltre ha diversi finali.

review: Gra ma dość ciekawy klimat, fajny jest pomysł escape room'u. Niestety zadania są dość schematyczne i  monotonne, a zagadki przez brak intuicyjności dość irytujące. Sterowanie też jest słabe, a wyciągnięcie niektórych przedmiotów z plecaka zbyt długo trwa.
developer_response:
Cześć,
Dzięki za opinie, grę została stworzona przez jedną osobę i to była moja pierwsza gra :D. Niedługo pojawi się ulepszona wersja (więcej w aktualizacji), na bazie silnika Play with Me 2, więc poprawione zostanie wiele rzeczy sterowanie, nie będzie plecaka itd.. Jeśli masz jakiekolwiek inne problemy z grą, zagadkami, daj mi znać. 

Jest nowa aktualizacja: https://store.steampowered.com/news/app/725780/view/4941001585206318177

review: Oyunda bir odada uyanıyorsunuz. Oyunun mantığı şöyle: Etrafta belli ipuçları var ve geçmeniz gereken kapılar. Siz hareket edemiyorsunuz. Sadece oradan oraya tıklıyorsunuz. Bir odadan diğer odaya geçiyorsunuz sürekli. İpuçlarını hızlı bir şekilde çözmek önemli. Karakterin sağlığı zamanla düşüyor. Etrafta sağlığı yenileyecek materyaller bulunsa da her odada bulunmuyor. Oyun ara sıra korkutmayı başarıyor. Çözmemiz gereken bulmacalar beni çok sıktı doğrusu. Bazıları anlamsız, ipuçlarıyla alakasız geldi. Bu yüzden oyunu istekli bir şekilde oynadığımı söyleyemem.

author: {'steamid': '76561198052332539', 'num_games_owned': 976, 'num_reviews': 335, 'playtime_forever': 319, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 319, 'last_played': 1614548521}
review:
[h1]*Play With Me* - Willst du mit mir spielen?[/h1]

Play With Me ist ein Escape-Room-Spiel, welches in der Ausgestaltung offensichtlich vom Horrorfilm Saw inspiriert wurde.

Wir spielen den Journalist Robert, der sich nach einem Autounfall plötzlich in der Gefangenschaft des Serienmörders "Illusion" wiederfindet. Wir haben wohl mit unseren Recherchen zu dessen Morden Staub aufgewirbelt. Unser Ziel im Spiel, die gestellten Prüfungen von "Illusion" bestehen, um dem ganzen Horror zu entkommen. Verkompliziert wird die Sache dadurch, dass sich scheinbar auch unsere Frau Sara und unser Freund Patrick in der Gewalt des Serienkillers befinden.

So arbeiten wir uns sehr linear von Raum zu Raum durch das von "Illusion" erzeugte Horrorszenario. Hierbei ist die Hauptaufgabe immer die gleiche. Die Tür zum nächsten Raum lässt sich immer nur mit einem PIN-Code öffnen. Diesen gilt es jeweils im Raum zu finden und zu entschlüsseln. 

Für etwas Abwechslung sorgt der gelegentliche Einsatz von Computern und unserem Handy. Einerseits finden wir auf dem Computer natürlich überlebensnotwendige Informationen und das Handy dient der Kontaktaufnahme mit Entführer und Gefangenen, beide können aber auch für ein nettes Spielchen zwischendurch oder auch als Notizbuch genutzt werden. Ein zusätzlicher Sammelmodus ist ebenfalls ins Spiel integriert.

Das Spiel bietet nichts wirklich weltbewegend Neues, es hat mir persönlich aber dennoch Spaß gemacht und die Entwickler haben sich viel Mühe gegeben, den Immersionslevel zu erhöhen. Hierzu zählt auch die Tatsache, dass unsere Entscheidungen tatsächlich über Leben und Tod entscheiden können und den Ausgang des Spieles maßgeblich bestimmen.

Für einen wirklich kleinen Preis erhält man hier für mehrere Stunden solide Unterhaltung. Mir hat es trotz einiger Schwächen gut gefallen!


👑 Powered by HoI 4 Deu Curators group in German / English 👑
[url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/30388691/] Follow Main group [/url]// [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/40282064/]Follow Second group [/url]

author: {'steamid': '76561198106894300', 'num_games_owned': 3074, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 318, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 318, 'last_played': 1618158455}
review:
老解谜佬了，说说不太好的地方。
1.机翻用的都不是个好机！真的，你哪怕稍微用点心呢，想挣中国人钱没毛病，你好歹稍微走走心吧？这机翻真的尬
2.游戏引导不能说做的很好，可以说是完全没有。比如有的关卡需要你往前倒退房间 什么碎片拼凑 闪出人影有的时候要点击，有的时候只是鼠标滑过，面对这种偶尔出现的新操作别说提示了，就连个音效都几乎没有，这怎么让玩家确认是不是要做什么呢？
3.剧情涣散，每关之间联系并不够紧密，都是只言片语和一小段录音，你在猜测上述操作的同时还要去自己猜想着剧情，体验很差
4.过了几关之后解密明显重复，有的关卡甚至就是凑数的一个简单密码组合，有充数嫌疑
我本人基本是懒得给游戏评价的，一般玩到游戏也不会退款。因为我觉的给开发商一些时间，说不定会有改观。但是最近玩了几个游戏体验都不太好，而且我觉得这是游戏框架上就出现了问题，应该也很难做到重制之类的，只能寄希望于他们至少花钱重做一下中文翻译或对这个游戏有幻想的玩家不要上当。我只能说，这真的是一段很痛苦的游戏经历！
developer_response:
Hello,
Thanks for Your review, soon will be new updates. But if You have a refund send me a private message (https://store.steampowered.com/steam_refunds/). Thanks :D.

author: {'steamid': '76561198026152663', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 528, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 528, 'last_played': 1616618498}
review:
Velmi příjemná logická hra (typu únikovka).
Zvuky dobré a grafika na tento typ hry dostačující.

Obtížnost mi přišla dobře vyvážená, až na asi dvě hádanky, které mi přišly ne moc logické (odhalitelné). "Pomocná ruka" ale nakonec většinou dostatečně pomohla.

Jednotlivé roomky se sice prozkoumávají stále stejným způsobem, ale občas přišlo nějaké ozvláštnění nebo překvapení, takže stereotyp nebyl problém.

Cena je podle mě na tuto hru adekvátní.

author: {'steamid': '76561198136397211', 'num_games_owned': 10791, 'num_reviews': 395, 'playtime_forever': 806, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 806, 'last_played': 1616566639}
review:
一款恐怖游戏外表下，寻找物品逃脱解谜游戏，大部分内容简介也有，关于游戏的评价，差评也一部分比较中肯。
“F”打开手电筒，“I”打开背包，无其他键位提示。游戏体验下来，简单模式下，解毒针，电池等很多用不上。
谜题单调，提示暴力，节奏较慢，其他也没什么想说的。
通关后可以从数据信息栏查看所收集到物品是否完备，以及解锁结局个数。
根据游戏进程中至关重要的两个分支任务，以及一间隐藏房间，游戏分为5个结局
[olist]
 [*]女友基友都救，进入隐藏房间
[*]女友基友都救，不进隐藏房间
[*]女友基友都不救
[*]救女友不救基友
[*]救基友不救女友
[/olist]
五个结局的走向大同小异，因为幕后黑手毕竟不会因主角的选择切换。
由于电脑配置问题，无法体验流畅游戏，所以花了三四个小时通关隐藏结局后，没有解锁新结局的欲望。（毕竟还要重开）
建议玩家体验时，在触发解救其他角色剧情和teaser房间时使用存档，以减少新周目的消耗时间。
可惜可惜我看不到全结局动画了，毕竟完成全成就一周目就足够。
游戏内有大量手机电脑载体小游戏，逃生时可以试着玩游戏规避危险重振心情（乐
为场景设计，恐怖音效好评，游戏体验中评，背景故事大体猜到了不做评价

author: {'steamid': '76561198267778836', 'num_games_owned': 125, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 296, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 296, 'last_played': 1616512522}
review: Alors, le jeu est moche, mais ça encore, on a vu pire. Mais en plus, il est bugé jusqu'à ma moelle, certaines énigmes n'ont pas de sens voire les bugs empêchent de comprendre celles-ci. Vraiment j'ai jamais vu un truc aussi nul. (Oh et ça fait pas peur hein)

review: Gioco sviluppato da una sola persona. Mi sento male a dire che non lo consiglio, perché nell'insieme l'idea è buona e la grafica pure. Il livello di difficoltà è piuttosto basso e ho trascinato i piedi per finirlo. Peccato...
developer_response: No problem, this is just a review, there is nothing wrong with negavie review. PS. You can play again (select "Torture of mind") and turn off the hints (main menu -> options -> hints), and game will be more difficult now. Also, the new game will (always) be different as new puzzles will be generated and items will be located in different places, animations, endings etc. Thanks.

author: {'steamid': '76561197998615657', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 180, 'playtime_forever': 421, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 421, 'last_played': 1613847471}
review:
[h1][b]PLAY WITH ME[/b][/h1]
Смесь point&click и поиск предметов в комнатах. К слову, в гнетущих, мрачных и страшных комнатах и помещениях. В каждой своя история, которую можно почитать в найденных записках. Мобильный телефон - как отдельный управляемый объект с мини-играми. В компьютерах тоже есть мини-игры. Рисовка игры приятная, атмосферная. Отсылки к фильму "Пила", игра пропитана духом этого фильма. Сюжет в игре тоже присутствует, плюс неожиданная развязка.

author: {'steamid': '76561197976955550', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 95, 'playtime_forever': 299, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 299, 'last_played': 1612474379}
review: A series of 20 or so rooms to progress through as you are haunted by a mysterious figure known as the `Illusionist`. The game is quite fun, although most puzzles are quite easy actually (we found there were a bit too many hints around, would have preferred less). Also the steam valves are really bugged and it is hard to turn them off in the 3 rooms in which they existed - kinda annoying. Other than that though it is quite a fun game, a few jump scare-ish moments, but overall more of a slowly creeping sense of dread than pure horror. We enjoyed it overall and would recommend it to any point-and-click puzzle-game lovers. The few puzzles where you really have to `think outside the box` are quite fun and original (the audio one creeped us out a lot!).

author: {'steamid': '76561198144658159', 'num_games_owned': 107, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 254, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 191, 'last_played': 1612372998}
review:
Oyun tıklanarak oynanıyor. Bir seri katil tarafından kaçırıldığınız senaryoda bilmeceleri çözerek çıkış yolunu bulmaya çalışıyorsunuz. Bulmacaların yanında optik ilüzyonlarla zenginleştirilmiş bir senaryo görüyoruz. Oyunun sizinle etkileşime girmesi ayrıca güzel bir detay. Kulaklıkla oynadığınızda etrafınızda birileri yürüyor gibi hissediyorsunuz ve ekranda gezen böcekler gerçekten de sanki ekranınızdaymış gibi hissettiriyor. 

Artıları:
+ Gerçekçi sesler
+ Güzel görsel detaylar
+ Az alan kaplıyor
+ Düşük sistem gereksinimi
+ Oyuncuyla etkileşim

Eksiler:
- Çok da iyi olmayan bir senaryo
- Bazı bölümler fazla kolay
- Seslendirmeler gerçekçi değil

review:
An interesting mix of horror, escape room and almost hidden-object level of sharp clues.
Worth a play, but be warned, it's easy to get stuck through reasons that aren't entirely your fault.

The game's clues are sometimes punishing to the point of being unfair, but it IS solvable and even boasts a wide selection of different endings depending on your choices (which are nice and obvious choices, rather than 'oops, i clicked a thing five rooms back')

author: {'steamid': '76561199085102882', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 424, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 422, 'last_played': 1632595532}
review:
Comment after finishing the game Play With Me(Saw inspired game): 

Whao~ what a ride.

Controls (mouse and alt key) is a bit bad. Takes a long time(3-5 seconds) for the animation to complete when player pulls out the mobile phone and match(death not too affected). 
But the mechanics and ideas are good! Tensed up environment, very close to a real escape room (in terms of story).  FNAF element in it too.
The tone of the female voice actress and the phone guy voices, not saying the lines in the proper atmosphere/feeling. 
The music for boss fights definitely scared me. The whole game's BGMs are have managed to lift up the atmosphere factor for the game. 

Gameplay:

Player is trapped in a 20 room facility. He can go back to any old rooms to collect items. The puzzles varied between UV light glow stick to playing on an old log computer to look for answers.
The are 2-3 place where it requires the player to enter a battle mode. It's a point-and-click story, so no arrow keys required. eg. The enemy keeps running right and left, in the dark, player has to use torch light and shine at him for a few rounds. 
Plenty of save points, also, game saves it for you after completing one room.

I got it at discount price for 0.60 euros. It is definitely compete-table with RPG horror story(non-battle) games. I would rate this game 40-45% as the mechanics needs to be brushed up, story plot wise can add much more to the current game, the style/equation to solve one room is getting a bit repetitive towards the end. I wish to see (personally) more utilisation of the old log computer(digging for mystery or activating a bomb by accident). : )

Overall, it's a nice experience(whao, what a ride), other than the slow puling out of matches and phone xD.

Hello :D, 

The game is inspired by the classic escape the room (i.e. find the key, code etc.). However, you wrote that you ended up at level 2. I added a few things like bosses in next rooms, or on level 3 You need to use a new item (ultraviolet), the same on level 4 (knife) etc. The game was created by one person. But this is only low-cost production, so you can't expect too much. But, in PWM 2 will be more different things, levels etc. Thanks.

author: {'steamid': '76561199110919698', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 218, 'playtime_forever': 332, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 332, 'last_played': 1609108545}
review: Bande son et ambiance flippantes bien réussies, texte en français et voix convaincantes. A part ça c'est un petit jeu indépendant pas mauvais mais pas abouti: énigmes toujours les mêmes c'est à dire trouver un code pour passer au niveau suivant, même quand on a les bons chiffres c'est assez tordu pour trouver leur ordre. Sympa d'avoir mis une aide lorsqu'on est bloqué pour passer au niveau suivant ça permet de finir le jeu sans problème mais ça enlève aussi tout l'intérêt d'un jeu de recherche.
developer_response:
Hello :D,
I'm making Play with Me 2 (you can find it on Steam) and I'll change the puzzles. Each door will have now a different mechanism. Play with Me 1 was inspired by classic escape room games i.e. the player always unlocks the door in the same way (code / key), but to get the code/key he has to do something else. Thanks for the opinion. If there are any problems, or you have suggestions on what to change, send me an e-mail (airempl@gmail.com) or post on the forum.

author: {'steamid': '76561198067090064', 'num_games_owned': 804, 'num_reviews': 372, 'playtime_forever': 369, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 369, 'last_played': 1606486515}
review:
Сначала я думал, что это просто игра похожая на "поиск предметов", но она зацепила непривычной стилизацией для игр этого жанра.
Посмотрев трейлер, я понял, что это квест, с довольно необычными задачами. Там и зеркалом нужно пользоваться и вращать записки.
Определённо, стоило заценить.

Вобщем, игра понравилась.
Действительно, зачастую тут оригинальные загадки.
Клёвый визуал, с оригинальными фишками. Например, по экрану бегают жучки.
Даже сюжет интригует в процессе.

Но блин! Фишки, всё-таки чуть-чуть не дожали. Вот например, в самом начале пишут, что лучше играть в наушниках с микрофоном. Но для чего микрофон в игре я так и не увидел. Или ещё, в игре можно пользоваться компьютерами, вот только в них кроме мини-игр почти нет полезной информации.
А некоторые загадки действительно выносят мозг!

Моя оценка 8 "Иллюзий" из 10.
Определённо, классная игра, но короткая, с затупами прошли за 5 часов. И хочется больше этих необычных фишек.

review: El juego tiene un argumento inquietante y apetece seguirlo hasta el final para descubrir la trama. Es un juego de ir avanzando por estancias resolviendo los acertijos aunque la dificultad de estas no es lineal y descoloca un poco. Si lo juegas en modo terror psicológico genera bastante tensión y lo hace más entretenido.

author: {'steamid': '76561198830750197', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 335, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 335, 'last_played': 1604783879}
review:
Данная игра оказалась довольно-таки хуже, той игры, которой я хотел увидеть.

В каждой комнате каждая загадка усложняется, из-за чего я не могу получить от неё нормального наслаждения, и каждый раз когда моей голове приходится долго думать, сидя за компьютером, я хочу заняться чем-то другим... от чего у меня вопрос к разработчикам: ЗАЧЕМ СОЗДАВАТЬ СТОЛЬ СЛОЖНЫЕ ГОЛОВОЛОМКИ ДЛЯ СТОЛЬ КОРОТКИХ "ИСТОРИЙ", В КОТОРЫХ КАК "СЛУШАТЕЛЬ" ХОЧЕШЬ ПО СКОРЕЕ ЗАКОНЧИТЬ, И УЗНАТЬ ЧЕМ ЖЕ ВСЁ ЗАКОНЧИТСЯ!!?

UPD:
(Я говорю про то, что в игре слишком много сложных загадок!!
И у меня бы не было ни одного намерения говорить про сложные задачи, если бы хоть как-нибудь сюжет был бы интересным.)
Ответ: Да,  я использовал руку-подсказку.
developer_response:
Hello,

Did You use "HINTS" ? https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Hwl1VNwhrtA, You can enable it in menu - > options -> game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198123916740', 'num_games_owned': 1997, 'num_reviews': 289, 'playtime_forever': 684, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 684, 'last_played': 1602732980}
review:
Okay, this is a game I wish I could just do neither thumbs up or down. It's not really a game I recommend or not recommend. First off, the graphics were decent, no complaints there. I did like that there was also an option to toggle jump scares (not as if I'd consider anything in the game "jump scare" worthy, but it's there for the weak of heart). The English (both in voice and text) was off, however, not by a lot, just a enough to kinda seem a bit weird at times, but nothing really overly distracting or confusing. Some of the articles included /'s in the text as well. My biggest issue lies with some of the puzzles in-game. I get that the devs were trying for "out-of-the-box" kind of thinking, but some just seemed a bit too convoluted, and sometimes the hint buttons didn't really help all that much. I dislike when puzzle/point and click games try too hard to be "challenging" without actually making any sense when playing for the first time. There are also multiple endings in the game, which I usually really love in a game, but honestly, I lost interest playing this game after the first run (I wouldn't even have gone for a 2nd ending had it not been for buggy achievements that didn't want to unlock on an old save). However, the story is actually pretty good and I did enjoy that part of the game.

Overall, I can't really recommend this game, but I also can't say that I don't. If you enjoy point and click escape room games, give it a try. Game is cheap (but I'd still suggest getting it on sale!), but just don't expect anything great.
developer_response: Are the achievements still not working? Can you tell me more about the achievement problem? What achievements were the problems with? Airem is one person, there is no devs :D. So, every opinion is helpful to me. Thank You.

author: {'steamid': '76561198019195236', 'num_games_owned': 437, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 878, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 878, 'last_played': 1585896806}
review:
Bardzo nowatorskie podejście do zagadek logicznych. DUŻY PLUS, mimo że z tego powodu ze 2-3 razy musiałam zajrzeć do poradnika aby to przejść.  Nie uważam jednak tego za minus ale za poszerzenie moich horyzontów myślowych (doceniając pomysłowość rozwiązań). 
Gra utrzymana jest w klimacie horroru, ale nie przesadnego epatowania obrzydliwościami. Intensywność straszenia jest też utrzymana na akceptowalnym poziomie, jest ono raczej wplecione w klimat całej gry, poszczególne lokacje są nim jakby wypełnione. Krótko mówiąc: horror na poziomie, i nawet osoby nie przepadające za takimi klimatami są w stanie przejść tę grę i ją docenić -czyli ja :-) .

author: {'steamid': '76561198119665341', 'num_games_owned': 246, 'num_reviews': 120, 'playtime_forever': 222, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 222, 'last_played': 1596023178}
review:
Curte Jogos Mortais? Curte Point 'n Click rechado de puzzles inteligentes e desafiadores?
Então Play with me é pra voce!
Começe o jogo acorrentado e procure por pistas para alem de sair das algemas, saber o que diabos aconteceu com voce e sua esposa Sara, quem esta por tras disso? Alem de tudo voce foi "envenenado" e começa a delirar apos certo tempo, tendo que procurar pelas seringas para garantir sua sanidade.
Vasculhe tudo, use lanterna, fosforo, isqueiro, faca, martelo, celular, computador....tudo pode conter o que voce precisa para escapar da sala e ir pra proxima.

[h1][b]NOTA 8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198036328736', 'num_games_owned': 3960, 'num_reviews': 727, 'playtime_forever': 122, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 122, 'last_played': 1595688917}
review:
[b]Escape room dans lequel on doit résoudre des énigmes pour échapper au serial-killer qui nous a kidnappé.[/b]


Alors ça, c'est en effet le pitch qui m'a fait m'intéresser au jeu car j'adore résoudre des énigmes et je trouvais attractif le contexte dans lequel se déroule l'histoire. 
Mais pourquoi alors je ne recommande pas ce jeu?

Il y a bien quelques aspects amusants dans le contenu du téléphone et de l'ordinateur, quelques animations un minimum convaincantes comme les insectes qui se baladent sur l'écran ou l'allumage de l'allumette et le principe d'un ou deux puzzles est (un peu) digne d'intérêt. Comme par hasard, c'est très précisément les éléments qui sont mis en avant pour promouvoir le jeu...

Pour le reste, on se retrouve dans quelque chose de très limité qui n'a jamais su me captiver et encore moins m'immerger dans cet univers sensé être plus ou moins horrifique.
Je me suis simplement retrouvé dans un mauvais jeu d'objets cachés mal réalisé, procurant surtout agacement, frustration et ennui mortel. Peut-être est-ce là la réelle torture promise par le meurtrier?

Des inscriptions laissées par le tueur qui ne sont pas intégrées dans le décor mais qu'on s'est bêtement contenté de rajouter grossièrement par dessus, l'utilisation du zoom suggérées pour récupérer certains indices qui met en évidence combien tout est moche et peu soigné, la regrettable impossibilité de combiner des objets de l'inventaire, des bugs d'affichage (empêchant par exemple de jouer dans de bonnes conditions si on change la résolution par défaut) et surtout l'extrême facilité des puzzles : voilà quelques uns des défauts de ce jeu.

Alors OK, je n'ai même pas fini ma première partie tant l'expérience s'est montrée peu amusante. Mais j'imagine que la réalisation et l'ambiance ne s'améliorent pas par la suite. Le doute est éventuellement permis quant au niveau de difficulté et d'originalité des énigmes suivantes.


Considérant que le prix reste modique ou que l'achat d'un bundle peut être intéressant, l'investissement pourrait peut-être satisfaire quelques amateurs d'HOG peu exigeants qui voudraient essayer de s'y frotter malgré tout pour son univers peu commun dans ce genre de jeu.

Pour tous les autres joueurs, je recommande d'éviter ce titre qui se révèle largement décevant et médiocre sur tous les points.

 


Lire aussi [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198036328736/recommended/1363850/]mon évaluation[/url] de [i]The Impossible[/i], le jeu réalisé ensuite par le même studio.

author: {'steamid': '76561198180339967', 'num_games_owned': 263, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 187, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 187, 'last_played': 1595700686}
review:
Могла бы быть очень годной, но не вышло. Очень много минусов, которые перечеркнули плюсы и в принципе положительные эмоции от игры.
Из плюсов:
-Классная графика (действительно очень атмосферненько)
-Множество неплохих загадок
-Сюжетная линия
Из минусов:
-Нет озвучки аудио, из-за этого не понятно о чём телефонные звонки,а значит сюжет раскрыт не полностью.
-Много багов. Серьезно. Ввожу пароль-неправильно,еще несколько раз ввожу.Беру подсказку,показывает тот же пароль. Лол,что?!
-Долгая анимация взаимодействия с предметами (касается телефона,спичек)
-Зачем-то через чур много предметов (аккумулятор для телефона,батарейки для фонарика, шприцы). Под конец осталось все, а шприцов так вообще около 5 штук.
Можно еще найти кучу моментов к чему докопаться, но мне не хочется. Для меня баги решили многое в этой игре.
Не рекомендую.Даже по скидке..
developer_response:
-Нет озвучки аудио, из-за этого не понятно о чём телефонные звонки,а значит сюжет раскрыт не полностью.

You mean Russian dubbing?

-Много багов. Серьезно. Ввожу пароль-неправильно,еще несколько раз ввожу.Беру подсказку,показывает тот же пароль. Лол,что?!

Could you tell me more? What room etc.?

I will soon update the game, Airem is one person studio it will take some time, beccause need update my other game THE IMPOSSIBLE. Thank You.

review: Font choice in the game clues made it so that I couldn't read the clues. For example EKR was actually E1CR, I can't imagine the difficulty someone with dyslexia would have playing this game. I had to consult a walkthrough to realize that I literally couldn't decipher the characters in the font choice. Made the game frustrating to the point that I had no desire to finish.
developer_response:
Hello :),

The game uses illusions, this is why the E1CR looks like EKR. But if you have problems you can use the right mouse button to read the code (SPOILER).

review:
